allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $docxPath = ''c:\\Users\\psmoo\\OneDrive\\Documents\\GitHub\\RPM\\Rob McCarthy Resume Summer 25.docx''; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\($docxPath\); $entry = $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_FullName -eq ''word/document.xml'' }; $stream = $entry.Open\(\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($stream\); $xml = [xml]$reader.ReadToEnd\(\); $reader.Close\(\); $zip.Dispose\(\); $xml.SelectNodes\(''//w:t'', \(New-Object System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager\($xml.NameTable\)\).AddNamespace\(''w'',''http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main''\)\) | ForEach-Object { $_InnerText }")
